io.kyma.project.connector.metadata

Class MetadataService

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.kyma.project.connector.metadata.MetadataService

  • @Service
public class MetadataService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service that registers metadata to Kyma/Extension Factory using an existing Connection Model and a reference to a file system. Furthermore Authentication Information required for API call-back can be passed.
    Author:
    Andreas Krause
    See Also:
    ConnectionModel

      MetadataService()

      void registerMetadata(ConnectionModel connectionModel, java.io.File metaDataFile, MetadataAuthenticationInformation authentication)
      Registers metadata to the Kyma / Extension Factory Application Registry using a pointer to a file with the appropriate JSON format

      Sets the ClientCertRestTemplateBuilder to be used by this object

    • Method Detail

      • setRestTemplateBuilder

        @Autowired
public void setRestTemplateBuilder(ClientCertRestTemplateBuilder restTemplateBuilder)
        Sets the ClientCertRestTemplateBuilder to be used by this object
        Parameters:
        restTemplateBuilder - ClientCertRestTemplateBuilder to be used by this Object

      • registerMetadata

        public void registerMetadata(ConnectionModel connectionModel,
                             java.io.File metaDataFile,
                             MetadataAuthenticationInformation authentication)
        Registers metadata to the Kyma / Extension Factory Application Registry using a pointer to a file with the appropriate JSON format
        Parameters:
        connectionModel - model containing all details for the connection to Kyma/Extension Factory
        authentication - model containing authentication data, can be null
        Throws:
        ApplicationConnectorException - if anything fails
        RestTemplateCustomizerException - if anything fails with acquiring the RestTemplate
        MetadataInvalidException - if Metadata is flawed (no syntax check though)
